attributes.action: Government starts encouraging public wearing masks
attributes.additional_details:
As I have read the data graph about coronavirus of Professor Mark Handley from UCL. The trend of coronavirus in UK is very similar to Italy. And the graph shows that the trend line of Japan is different to other European countries, I believe it is because the public in Japan has high awareness of wearing masks to prevent the spread of virus. 
I think it is urgent for the government to take actions, otherwise, UK has to lockdown the country like Italy
attributes.background: Government starts encouraging public wearing masks and also manufacturers to set up masks production line.Moreover, government spares no effort to procure the masks all over the world

rejection.details:
Guidance for people with confirmed or possible coronavirus (COVID-19) infection is being developed by Public Health England, and decisions about medical advice are a matter for medical professionals and the NHS.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
